name: Paraşüt Yazılım Teknolojileri A.Ş.
description: Devloper of a cloud-based financial software designed to offer invoice management services. The company's software offers bookkeeping tools to small and medium-sized businesses, featuring e-invoicing, e-billing, as well as online revenue and expenditure tracking system, enabling clients to save time and human resource.
one_liner: Devloper of a cloud-based financial software designed to offer invoice management services. The company's software offers bookkeeping tools to small and medium-sized businesses, featuring e-invoicing, e-billing, as well as online revenue and expenditure tracking system, enabling clients to save time and human resource.
